sentences.en: Carbonate sediments in all environments are basically products of an ancient biochemical system.
sentences.cn: 一切环境的碳酸盐沉积物,基本上都是古代生物化学体系的产物.

sentences.en: Carbonation is the combination of carbonate or bicarbonate ions with minerals.
sentences.cn: 碳酸作用是碳酸根离子或重碳酸根离子与矿物的化合作用.

sentences.en: Diphenyl carbonate shows a typical vinyl ester effect.
sentences.cn: 碳酸二苯酯表现典型的乙烯的酯类的效应.

sentences.en: Dolomites usually have higher rhombic carbonate / CaO ratio.
sentences.cn: 白云石通常具有较高的斜方晶碳酸盐/CaO比例.

sentences.en: Essentially fractures can cut most types of carbonate fabric.
sentences.cn: 实质上裂缝可割切大多数类型的碳酸盐组织.

sentences.en: Glauconite, detrital carbonate skeletal debris, marine fossils, and collophane are commonly present.
sentences.cn: 海绿石 、 碳酸盐骨骸碎屑 、 海相化石和胶磷矿普遍出现.

sentences.en: Hard water which can be softened by adding sodium carbonate is called permanent hard water.
sentences.cn: 经过加入碳酸钠能被软化的硬水,称为永硬水.

sentences.en: In order to calcine calcium carbonate fines, the technique of high - temperature pelletization has successfully been used.
sentences.cn: 为了煅烧碳酸钙细粉, 已经成功地应用了高温成球技术.

sentences.en: In places on Crationic edges, giant carbonate platforms may develop.
sentences.cn: 在克拉通(稳定地块)边缘的某些地区, 可发现巨大的碳酸盐台地.

sentences.en: It is stirred with 10 % sodium carbonate solution ( 50 ml ) and then with water ( 50 ml ), after which It'solidifies.
sentences.cn: 与10%碳酸钠溶液 ( 50毫升 ) 混合搅拌,然后再用50毫升水混合搅拌, 从而析出固体.

sentences.en: Limestone is rock composed of calcium carbonate.
sentences.cn: 石灰石是由碳酸钙所构成的岩石.

sentences.en: Many carbonate masses older than Middle Palaeozoic are of dolomite rather than calcite.
sentences.cn: 中古生代以前的许多碳酸盐类矿物是白云石而不是方解石.

sentences.en: Rock faces commonly show a stockwork of intersecting quartz and carbonate veins.
sentences.cn: 岩石的外表呈现交织的石英及碳酸盐细脉组成的网格构造.

sentences.en: The calcium carbonate content of phosphate rock determines the pore structure.
sentences.cn: 磷矿中碳酸钙的含量决定了磷矿的毛细孔结构.

sentences.en: The carbonate from calcium carbonate, if not remoyed by calcining may cause foaming in the reactors.
sentences.cn: 碳酸钙中存在的碳酸根, 如果不经煅烧除去,会在反应槽中引起泡沫生成.

words.tran_cn: 碳化的，碳酸的；含二氧化碳的
碳化；使与碳化合；使成碳

phrases.tran_cn: 碳酸盐岩台地；碳酸盐地台
碳酸盐岩储层；碳酸盐岩油储
碳酸丙烯酯；碳酸丙二酯

trans.tran_en: a salt (= chemical substance formed by an acid ) that contains  carbon  and oxygen

trans.tran_cn: 使充满二氧化碳；使变成碳酸盐
